title: Drawing, "A Quinquet Lamp", September 1851
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ?, at bottom with Caption and date; the South direction is indicated.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view with shore line making an angle in the middle distance, as houses stand upon sloping and rocky backward part.  In the foreground are water troughs and trees, shown in bird's eye view.

Verso: a Quinquet land and details of it in indistinct design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Quinquet Lamp", September 1851.
September 1851. Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-43.
